name: Lactea Volleyball
description:
Lactea Volleyball is a game made to be simple and fun to play, choose or create your team and aim well to beat your opponents.

Game Modes
Play alone or with a friend locally in mode 'Friendly' or...
Face five full championships for years in mode 'Seasons'.

12 Teams
Choose between twelve teams with unique players, and find yours weaknesses and strengths to define your strategy.

Team's Creator
Make twelve customizable teams.

Others
12 courts with differents environments.
3 difficulty levels.
32 achievments to unlock.
